base_description: White porcelain toilet with a modern design.
part_description: Consists of a tank, bowl, seat, and lid. The tank is rectangular and positioned at the back. The bowl is oval-shaped, connected to the base. The seat and lid are circular, placed on top of the bowl.
internal_interaction_description: The tank holds water, which is released into the bowl when the flush mechanism is activated. The water flow cleans the bowl and removes waste. The seat and lid can be lifted or lowered, providing functionality and hygiene. All parts are securely attached, ensuring stability and efficiency.
external_interaction_description: The toilet connects to plumbing for water supply and waste removal. Users interact by lifting the lid, sitting on the seat, and activating the flush. It requires regular cleaning and maintenance. Its design fits standard bathroom layouts, ensuring ease of use and accessibility for people.
